about_the_game:
The complete horror-comedy series!
Join protagonist BB as she collects material for her zines in a mysterious world of drinky birds, secret rooms, dream resorts, waterparks, bort dolls, immersive theater, beachfront novelty shirts, police men, serial killers, art freeports and unorthodox medical treatment. Nobody's getting out of here alive!

  • Voice Of The Killer
    BB joins a call center on the edge of the city, but a horrible noise can be heard from the sea. Does the voice of the Killer sound out this far...?

  • Hands Of The Killer
    A strange sound is heard from within the walls of the apartment block - they say the hands of the Killer are roaming around.

  • Drool Of The Killer
    Beneath the tiles of the swimming pool complex, a new world is striving to be born. This is the TAMMY show, coming soon to a city near you.

  • Eyes Of The Killer
    It's the hit of the season and applause rings out night after night. But why do all the people that come to see it disappear? What does "immersive theatre" mean... and will BB survive to tell anybody else?

  • Flesh Of The Killer
    BB and her friends sneak into a tax exempt freeport on the edge of the city. What kind of animal has been evolving underground in the forbidden Museum Of Moral Art?

  • Blood Of The Killer
    In the quiet country town the drinky birds lie dreaming and severed heads roll slowly down the street. BB must discover the terrible secret of the lost zine distro, or fall prey to its curse...

  • Ears Of The Killer
    A new music scene is forming - it's known as "Crime Wave" and all of the songs are about killing people. Can BB and her sister ZZ outrun the New Wave, or is it true nothing can change the shape of things to come?

  • Heart Of The Killer
    At the Dream Resort the days slip by quietly in the murmuring pines. At night a dreadful vision of desire stalks the halls.

  • Face Of The Killer
    All the dogs in town are laughing: there is talk of a new play. As fireworks burst over the city, BB finds herself looking into the face of the Killer.


Collects all nine games in the series in one easy loader, complete with additional features like joypad support and bonus rooms. Comes with free zine. A miracle collab by thecatamites (Space Funeral, Goblet Grotto, 10 Beautiful Postcards) and Tommy Tone (Goblet Grotto, Magic Wand, 10 Beautiful Postcards OSTs) with diorama art and posters by comics artist A. Degen (Soft X-Ray: Mindhunters, The Marchenoir LIbrary).

"History is a nightmare - - and loving it!!"

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon dismemberment, occasional nudity of headless background figures, swearing, alcohol depiction

detailed_description:
The complete horror-comedy series!
Join protagonist BB as she collects material for her zines in a mysterious world of drinky birds, secret rooms, dream resorts, waterparks, bort dolls, immersive theater, beachfront novelty shirts, police men, serial killers, art freeports and unorthodox medical treatment. Nobody's getting out of here alive!

    BB joins a call center on the edge of the city, but a horrible noise can be heard from the sea. Does the voice of the Killer sound out this far...?

  • Hands Of The Killer

  • Drool Of The Killer

  • Eyes Of The Killer

  • Flesh Of The Killer

  • Heart Of The Killer

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz CPU with two hardware threads
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz CPU with four hardware thread
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Anthology Of The Killer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: X64 Dual Core CPU 2+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD Phenom II X4 96
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB | AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews:
“...like having the language centers of your brain treated with a batch of medicinal maggots.”
Rock Paper Shotgun

“It’s not uncommon to have the word “dreamlike” applied to a work of fiction. It’s usually shorthand for the weird and surreal. But I don’t think I’ve seen one come closer to actually resembling a dream than Anthology of the Killer.”
Destructoid

“If you’re a fan of games like Space Funeral, you absolutely should pick this up.”
Indie Hell Zone
short_description: The complete surrealist horror-comedy series! A mysterious world of zines and blood!!
